Articles.Content:
So, I logged on and I am having a blast with the new update. Anyway, as I am exploring the new Space Centre, I discovered that some of the buildings have stairs. And that the main VAB has a stair case that leads up to a USABLE LADDER! Which then leads to another, and another, until you are on the roof. There are heli-pads and best of all...

A giant height to base-jump Kerbals from.

So... what should we do with this suddenly climbable VAB? Use it to land heli-copters? Use it to drop Kerbals?

Personally, I'm in the course of building a private Chinook for Bill, Bob and Jeb... If I can get them down from the K.S.S Dawn. Otherwise I am going to try to design a Kerbal playground, with giant leaps onto bouncy things and things that explode!

(P.S. If anyone wants to know how to get up, just got to the front of the VAB in a car or something, then EVA and go up the stairs, then go to the big ladder. You may have to jump to grab on but you should be able to "F" and grab.)
Welp, I know what I'm doing now...
